GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array with one object selected by article_id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array with all article objects with additional comment count property

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array with one comments with corresponding article id
